Overview

Offset Name Description Type
0x0 config REG
0x4 ldpc_fifo_status REG
0x8 frames_in_transit REG
0xC bit_mapper_ram - 0x00 - 0x03: QPSK map - 0x04 - 0x0B: 8PSK map - 0x0C - 0x1B: 16APSK map - 0x1C - 0x3B: 32APSK map MEM[240]
0x3CC polyphase_filter_coefficients Depth needs to match polyphase_filter's NUMBER_TAPS MEM[512]
0xBCC axi_debug_input_width_converter_cfg REG

config 
 Register
Offset: 0x0
Access: READ_WRITE
[17:0] physical_layer_scrambler_shift_reg_init

Initial value for the physical layer's scrambler X vector, used to set a device's gold code.

bit_mapper_ram 
- 0x00 - 0x03: QPSK map - 0x04 - 0x0B: 8PSK map - 0x0C - 0x1B: 16APSK map - 0x1C - 0x3B: 32APSK map		 Memory (depth: 240, read latency: 1)
Offset: 0xC
Access: READ_WRITE
[31:0] data
  • 0x00 - 0x03: QPSK map
  • 0x04 - 0x0B: 8PSK map
  • 0x0C - 0x1B: 16APSK map
  • 0x1C - 0x3B: 32APSK map
   Reset: 0x0

axi_debug_input_width_converter_cfg 
 Register
Offset: 0xBCC
Access: READ_WRITE
[0] block_data

Disables data from passing through

   Reset: 0x0
[1] allow_word

Allows a single word to pass through. Needs block_data to be set before setting this.

   Reset: 0x0
Self-clearing
[2] allow_frame

Allow a single frame to complete. Needs block_data to be set before setting this.

   Reset: 0x0
Self-clearing

   Reset: 0x0
